about.description:
I have over 6 years of experience in developing and delivering scalable, secure, and reliable solutions for various industry domains using Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, and Agile methodologies.

Domains I have worked on:
. Finance
. Banking
. Retail
. iGaming

Tech stack:
. Java 8, Java 11, Java 17
. Spring Boot, Spring
. Hibernate
. Microservices
. RDBMS - PostgreSQL, MySql
. NoSQL - MongoDB, Cassandra, Elasticsearch
. GIT, GITLAB, IntelliJ
. Docker, Kubernetes
, GoCD
. Jira, Confluence, Agile Scrum, Kanban
. Angular, React

experience.job-1.description:
- Development of new functionality for web applications with microservice architecture.

Projects stack:
- Java 8, Spring Boot, Hibernate / JPA, PostgreSQL, Cassandra, Spark, Elasticsearch, Liquibase, Flyway, Docker, Maven, Gradle, Liferay, React, Angular.

I mostly work as a backend developer ( Java Spring Framework), with occasional switching to frontend tasks (React).

- Developed new functionality for the application.

- Solved current tasks on the backend and frontend.

- Refactoring existing code to the changing wishes of the client.

- Created SQL - queries to databases.

- Integration and Unit - testing using junit, mockito.
experience.job-2.description:
Construction company

- Independently created a company website.
- Created a network and electronic document management.
- Increased the company's revenue more than four times.
- Established relationships with suppliers.
- Increased the number of regular customers.
experience.job-3.description:
- Remote work

- Development "from scratch" of an application for managing tariffs and billing of transactions.

- Work on VTB Bank projects

- Project stack:
Java 11, Spring Boot, Kafka, Hibernate / JPA, Ehcache, PostgreSQL, Liquibase, Flyway, Docker, Maven, Redis, Ehcache, Elasticsearch, Apache Tomcat.

- Communicating with the business and testing team
- Onboard new developers
- Creation of architecture
- Development of new functionality of the application
- Development of Rest - services
- Writing SQL code and maintaining the database.
- Integration and unit tests using junit, mockito.
- Creation of libraries for Spring projects
- Help and training of other developers
experience.job-5.description:
- Projects stack:
Java 8 - 11, Spring Boot, Spring, PostgreSQL, Liquibase, Docker, Maven, Gradle, Splunk, GoCD, Kubernetes, Terraform, SoapUI.

- Development of new functionality
- Solving current problems in a different technology stack.
- Support for current functionality.
- Writing SQL code and maintaining the database.
- Integration and unit tests using junit, mockito.
